project_descr: SUSTAINABLE INTEGRATION AND RECOVERY IN RNO-A

outputs.output_descr: This project aims to support integration of displaced people and improvement of life level in the region through enhancement of local  employment opportunities , development of sustainable livelihoods, enhancement capacity of local authorities and NGOs involved in economic and social recovery. Special attention is given to the most vulnerable groups, i.e. women, single headed female households, elderly and invalids.

project_title: sustainable integration and recovery in rno-a
